img.alt: Public Notice Budget Hearing with Adoption and Approval Thursday, April 30, 2020, at 6:00 PM via Zoom Meeting ID: 984 0960 3832, Password: 016506

span.strong: ANNOUNCEMENT â CORONAVIRUS UPDATE â APRIL 17, 2020

p.strong: The Pleasantville School District will extend the closure of all schools until May 15, 2020 pursuant to the Governorâs direction.

div.p: Therefore, virtual/remote learning will begin again following Spring Break on Monday, April 20, 2020.Â We will provide you with any updates on whether the closure will be extended or whether schools will re-open, as we receive information from the Governorâs office.

p.strong: The District will continue to provide food packets.
Breakfast and Lunch may be picked up on Monday and Wednesday between 9:00am and 11:00am.
Please stay home and stay safe.

span.strong: ANUNCIO - ACTUALIZACIÃN DE CORONAVIRUS - 17 DE ABRIL DE 2020

p.strong: El Distrito Escolar de Pleasantville extenderÃ¡ el cierre de todas las escuelas hasta el 15 de mayo de 2020
en conformidad con las instrucciones del Gobernador.

Por lo tanto, el aprendizaje virtual / remoto comenzarÃ¡ nuevamente despuÃ©s de las vacaciones de primavera el lunes 20 de abril de 2020. Le proporcionaremos actualizaciones sobre si el cierre se extenderÃ¡ o si las escuelas volverÃ¡n a abrir, ya que recibimos informaciÃ³n de la oficina del gobernador.
El distrito continuarÃ¡ proporcionando paquetes de alimentos.
El desayuno y el almuerzo se pueden recoger los lunes y miÃ©rcoles de 9:00 a.m. a 11:00 a.m.
Por favor, quÃ©dese en casa y mantÃ©nganse seguros.

div.span: Pleasantville Public School District reaponse to addressing all
Click below to read letters of updates.

div.p: THE PLEASANTVILLE BOARD OF EDUCATION WILL BE CANCELLING RECEIPT OF BIDS OR PROPOSALS PUBLICLY ADVERTISED PER N.J.S.A. 40A:1-23 AND 18A:18A-21.
NO BIDS OR PROPOSALS SHALL BE RECEIVED DURING THE PERIOD OF MARCH 16, 2020 TO MARCH 30, 2020 DUE TO MANDATORY SCHOOL CLOSING.
BID 19-24 HVAC PARTS AND MOTORSÂ Â MARCH 18, 2020
BID 20-10 BUS REPAIR & MAINTENANCE SERVICE MARCH 18, 2020
ANY BIDS MAILED TO THE PLEASANTVILLE BOARD WILL BE RETURNED UNOPENED TO VENDOR. DUE TO THE UNFORSEEN CIRCUMSTANCES THE BIDS AND PROPOSALS WILL BE READVERTISED.
